entries: When it isn't injured, a barking stag benefits from {@action Cover Tracks}, regardless of its travel Speed.
top.name: Foil the Hunt

entries: A barking stag takes 10 additional damage from arrows (but not bolts or other ammunition).
mid.name: Arrow Vulnerability

bot.requirements: The barking stag has a creature {@condition grabbed} with its antler
entries: The barking stag tosses the {@condition grabbed} creature 20 feet into the air and up to 15 feet away in a direction of its choice, dealing {@damage 3d10+12} piercing damage plus falling damage to the creature.
bot.name: Antler Toss

entries: Medium or smaller, hoof, DC 30.
bot.name: Trample

entries: Creatures with this ability can communicate with each other by manifesting an aura of wispy Utopian runes. This has the effects of telepathy with a range of 300 feet, but requires line of sight.
top.name: Convergent Link

entries: While a convergent giant eagle is {@condition confused}, {@condition fascinated}, or {@condition frightened}, it loses its convergent link and convergent tactics abilities.
mid.name: Disrupted Link

entries: When a giant eagle succeeds at a Reflex save, it critically succeeds instead.
mid.name: Evasion

entries: +30 Str +5, Dex +0, Con +4, Int +3, Wis +3, Cha +6 Items +2 greater striking bastard sword, +2 greater resilient chain mail, +2 greater striking composite longbow (20 arrows), key to strongbox in area A10.
top.name: Survival

entries: Creatures with this ability can communicate with each other by manifesting an aura of wispy Utopian runes. This has the effects of telepathy with a range of 300 feet, but requires line of sight.
top.name: Convergent Link

entries: Kendley is {@condition confused}, {@condition fascinated}, or {@condition frightened}, she loses her innate spells and her convergent link and convergent tactics abilities.
mid.name: Disrupted Link While

entries: Kendley casts calm emotions, creatures {@condition controlled} by the convergence lattice automatically fail their saving throws against the effect, but they can still use {@condition hostile} actions against creatures who aren't {@condition controlled} by the convergence lattice. Each time she Sustains the Spell, creatures affected by the spell are exposed to the convergence lattice as though they had been in conversation with her.
bot.name: Convergent Calm When

entries: Kendley's attacks (including telekinetic projectile) deal an extra {@dice 4d8} damage to creatures within reach of one of her allies who has convergent tactics.
bot.name: Convergent Tactics

entries: Creatures with this ability can communicate with each other by manifesting an aura of wispy Utopian runes. This has the effects of telepathy with a range of 300 feet, but requires line of sight.
top.name: Convergent Link

entries: While a convergent soldier is {@condition confused}, {@condition fascinated}, or {@condition frightened}, they lose their convergent link and convergent tactics abilities.
mid.name: Disrupted Link

entries: The convergent soldier's attacks deal an extra {@dice 4d8} damage to creatures within reach of one of their allies with convergent tactics.
bot.name: Convergent Tactics

entries: Utopian runes burst from the convergent soldier. Any creature {@condition stupefied} by the convergence lattice who is within 100 feet of the convergent soldier and can see the runes must attempt a DC 34 Will save.

entries.Failure: For 1 round, the creature is {@condition flat-footed} to creatures with the convergent link ability and counts as an ally with convergent tactics for the purposes of activating the convergent tactics ability.
entries.Critical Failure: As failure, and the creature is also {@condition slowed|CRB|slowed 1} for 1 round due to the information overload.

bot.name: Force Communication

entries: Inclines and rocky areas are not difficult terrain for an Elysian sheep.
top.name: Nimble Grazer

entries: Elysian sheep gains the {@condition fleeing} condition whenever it has the {@condition frightened} condition.
mid.name: Cowardly An

entries: Medium or smaller, hoof, DC 24.
bot.name: Trample

entries: 100 feet. Titans warp perception and distance around them to seem even larger and more imposing. A creature that enters or begins its turn within the emanation must succeed at a DC 44 Will save or its movement toward the titan is movement over difficult terrain (greater difficult terrain on a critical failure) for 1 round.
mid.name: Impossible Stature

entries: The titan makes a fist {@action Strike} against a creature affected by their Impossible Stature, even if it's outside of the titan's normal reach. On a hit, the titan automatically Grabs the creature and, if out of their reach, pulls it within reach.
bot.name: Titanic Grasp

entries: The titan makes a melee weapon {@action Strike} against each foe within their reach. This counts as three attacks for the titan's multiple attack penalty.
bot.name: Wide Cleave

entries: +28, {@skill Society} +28, {@skill Stealth} +27 Str +8, Dex +2, Con +9, Int +4, Wis +3, Cha +8.
top.name: Religion

entries: A glabrezu's lies sustain them, and the truth can destroy them. Whenever a {@trait revelation} effect counteracts or reveals the glabrezu's illusions or the glabrezu fails a save against an effect that would prevent them from lying (such as zone of truth), the demon takes {@damage 5d6} mental damage. They take this damage only once per effect, even if the effect reveals multiple illusions or prevents multiple lies.
mid.name: Truth Vulnerability

bot.requirements: A creature is {@condition grabbed} in the glabrezu's pincer
entries: The glabrezu pulls the {@condition grabbed} creature up to 5 feet closer, then makes two claw Strikes against it. Those Strikes count as one attack when determining the glabrezu's multiple attack penalty, and the penalty doesn't increase until after both Strikes.
bot.name: Captive Rake

entries: When a reaction would disrupt the glabrezu's spell, the demon can attempt a DC {@flatDC 15} flat check, avoiding the disruption on a success.
bot.name: Steady Spellcasting

entries: A glabrezu can always use {@skill Deception} when rolling initiative as long as they're aware of at least one opponent before initiative is rolled. When using {@skill Deception} for initiative, the demon gains a +2 circumstance bonus to {@skill Deception}.
bot.name: Sudden Betrayal

entries: A glabrezu's illusory disguise enables it to appear as a creature of any size.
bot.name: Treacherous Veil

entries: Once per month, a glabrezu can grant a mortal humanoid the effects of a {@spell miracle} spell granted by an Abyssal patron, though the glabrezu always perverts the miracle according to their own treacherous nature.
bot.name: Twisted Desires

entries: Kirosthrek senses a creature's mental essence at the listed range.
top.name: Thoughtsense

entries: 30 feet. As xulgath thoughtmaw (page 85), but DC 42.
mid.name: Psychogenic Secretions

mid.trigger: Kirosthrek attempts a saving throw against a spell
entries: Kirosthrek diverts some of the spell's energy, gaining a +2 circumstance bonus to the saving throw or +4 if the spell has the {@trait mental} trait. If she critically succeeds at the saving throw, she can use the {@action Cast a Spell} action on her next turn to cast the triggering spell at the same level without expending any spell slots.
mid.name: Divert Thoughts

entries: fly, true seeing Occult Rituals DC 42; call spirit, inveigle, planar binding.
bot.name: Constant

entries: As xulgath thoughtmaw (page 85), but DC 42.
bot.name: Consume Knowledge

entries: At the start of Sarvel's turn, if he is dead, {@condition unconscious}, or otherwise unable to act, his efforts in the unfinished extinction curse ritual pull on the power of an aeon orb. The surge of power heals his body completely without causing the {@condition wounded} condition, causes him to grow an additional tentacle, and attempts to counteract all detrimental effects on Sarvel as a 10thlevel effect with a +42 counteract modifier. An aeon orb used by Sarvel or the heroes is depleted and can't be used to power this ability.
mid.name: Echoes of Aeons

entries: 30 feet. A creature that enters or begins their turn in the emanation must attempt a DC 45 Fortitude save. On a failure, the creature is {@condition sickened|CRB|sickened 2} and {@condition confused} for 1 round; on a critical failure, it can't target Sarvel with any Strikes or other effects from its {@condition confused} condition.
While within the emanation, the creature takes a –2 penalty to saves to recover from the {@condition sickened} condition.
A creature that succeeds at its save is temporarily immune to all xulgaths' stenches for 1 minute. Sarvel can suppress or resume this aura as a free action.
mid.name: Enraging Stench

entries: Sarvel begins combat with two tentacles. Each tentacle has 66 HP and is immune to area damage.
A creature can attempt to sever one.
mid.name: Touch of Zevgavizeb

entries: Sarvel's tentacles by specifically targeting it and dealing damage equal to the tentacle's Hit Points. A tentacle not completely severed returns to full HP at the end of any creature's turn. For each tentacle he has, Sarvel gains an extra reaction at the start of his turn that can be used only for an {@action Attack of Opportunity}. If he has no tentacles, he can no longer make tentacle Strikes, Writhe.
mid.name: of

entries: only.
mid.name: Attack of Opportunity

entries: divine lance, message, read aura, shield; Constant (4th) air walk, freedom of movement Rituals DC 45; Abyssal pact, atone, commune.
bot.name: Cantrips

entries: {@damage 4d8+12} bludgeoning, DC 45.
bot.name: Constrict

entries: Sarvel makes one tentacle {@action Strike} with each tentacle he currently has (to a maximum of six Strikes), but he can't target a single creature with more than one {@action Strike}. Each attack counts toward his multiple attack penalty, but the penalty doesn't increase until all the attacks have been made.
bot.name: Writhe Independently

entries: The saurian warmonger bellows, evoking the power of the primordial world. Non-dinosaur creatures within 30 feet take {@damage 10d6} sonic damage (DC 34 basic Fortitude save). On a failed save, a creature is also {@condition slowed|CRB|slowed 2} for 1 round ({@condition stunned} {@dice 1d4} on a critical failure). The saurian can't use Boneshaking Roar again for {@dice 1d4} rounds.
bot.name: Boneshaking Roar

entries: A warmonger wields their mancatcher in one hand.
bot.name: Primordial Balance

entries: When the warmonger makes a successful mancatcher {@action Strike}, their target must succeed at a DC 34 Reflex save or become {@condition grabbed} until the end of the warmonger's next turn. Each time the creature fails an attempt to {@action Escape} the warmonger, it takes {@damage 2d6} piercing damage.
bot.name: Restrain

entries: The saurian warmonger makes three Strikes: one {@action Strike} each with the weapons in their hands and one {@action Strike} with their tail.

They can perform these attacks in any order, though each counts toward their multiple attack penalty as normal. After making a Three-Limbed Lunge, the warmonger is {@condition flat-footed} until the beginning of their next turn.
bot.name: Three-Limbed Lunge

entries: +35, {@skill Survival} +34 Str +7, Dex +9, Con +6, Int +5, Wis +8, Cha +6 Items javelins (2), +2 greater striking naginata.
top.name: Stealth

entries: Trigger A creature makes a melee {@action Strike} against the worldwatcher but misses; The worldwatcher breaks the triggering creature's limb or weapon. If the triggering {@action Strike} was an unarmed attack, the triggering creature takes {@damage 6d6} bludgeoning damage and becomes {@condition clumsy|CRB|clumsy 1} until the limb is reset (an {@action Interact} action with the {@trait manipulate} trait). If the triggering {@action Strike} was a weapon {@action Strike}, the weapon takes {@damage 6d6} bludgeoning damage.
mid.name: Raptor Jaw Disarm

entries: As saurian warmonger, but DC 38.
bot.name: Boneshaking Roar

On a failed save, a creature is also {@condition slowed|CRB|slowed 2} for 1 round ({@condition stunned} {@dice 1d4} on a critical failure). The saurian can't use Boneshaking Roar again for {@dice 1d4} rounds.

entries: Whenever the worldwatcher hits a creature with their fist or naginata {@action Strike}, that creature must succeed at a DC 39 Fortitude save or be {@condition stunned|CRB|stunned 1} ({@condition stunned|CRB|stunned 3} on a critical hit).
bot.name: Stunning Blow

entries: +38, {@skill Religion} +38, {@skill Stealth} +36 Str +10, Dex +4, Con +9, Int +8, Wis +6, Cha +8 Items +2 greater resilient full plate, +3 greater striking halberd.
top.name: Intimidation

mid.name: Impossible Stature
entries_as_xyz: 100 feet. Titans warp perception and distance around them to seem even larger and more imposing. A creature that enters or begins its turn within the emanation must succeed at a DC 44 Will save or its movement toward the titan is movement over difficult terrain (greater difficult terrain on a critical failure) for 1 round.

entries: The titan can use their {@action Attack of Opportunity} when a creature within their reach uses a concentrate action, in additional to its normal trigger. They disrupt actions on any hit, not just a critical hit—including triggering concentrate actions.
mid.name: Attack of Opportunity

entries: {@damage 4d10+25} piercing Melee foot +39 (agile, reach 30 feet), Damage {@damage 4d8+20} bludgeoning Ranged {@as 1} rock +39 (brutal, range increment 200 feet), Damage {@damage 3d12+20} bludgeoning Divine Innate Spells DC 45; 10th massacre, meteor swarm; 8th dispel magic (at will), spiritual epidemic (at will), suggestion (at will); 7th spell turning; 6th scrying (×3); 5th sending; Constant (10th) air walk, true seeing Divine Rituals DC 45; planar ally, resurrect.
bot.name: S), Damage

bot.trigger: The titan damages a creature capable of using divine spells or abilities
entries: The creature must attempt a DC 45 Will save. Critical Success The creature is unaffected. Success The creature can't use divine spells or abilities for 1 round and is {@condition frightened|CRB|frightened 2}. Only powerful non-divine magic, such as wish, can undo this effect. Failure As success, but the duration is 1 minute. Critical Failure As success, but the duration is unlimited.
bot.name: Godslayer
bot.entries_as_xyz: Ability not found: 'Godslayer As success, but the duration is 1 minute. Critical Failure As success, but the duration is unlimited.' in Thanatotic Titan, p.83

entries: If a titan's rock {@action Strike} isn't a critical failure, the rock explodes, dealing {@dice 10d6} damage of a damage type of the titan's choice to all creatures in a 20- foot burst (DC 45 basic Reflex save).
bot.name: Throw Rock

entries: The titan {@action Stride||Strides} twice and makes a melee {@action Strike}. If the {@action Strike} hits, the titan can cast {@spell earthquake} centered on the target as a free action.
bot.name: Titanic Charge

entries: Huge or smaller, foot, DC 45.
bot.name: Trample

entries: The titan makes a melee weapon {@action Strike} against each foe within their reach. This counts as three attacks for the titan's multiple attack penalty.
bot.name: Wide Cleave

attacks.name: jaws
attacks.damage: {@damage 3d8+17} piercing plus {@damage 2d8} {@condition persistent damage ||persistent bleed} and smoking wound

entries: 60 feet, DC 37.
mid.name: Frightful Presence

entries: A vavakia is repulsed by the restoration of souls. The demon takes {@damage 3d10+10} mental damage the first time each round that a creature within 100 feet of it is restored to life or loses the {@condition doomed} condition.
mid.name: Restoration Vulnerability

entries: A creature damaged by the vavakia's jaws is {@condition sickened|CRB|sickened 1} from the rank smell of vapors from the wound.
bot.name: Smoking Wound

entries: The vavakia exhales ghostly green fire in a 60-foot cone. Living creatures in the area take {@damage 20d6} negative damage (DC 42 basic Reflex save). A good creature that fails this save is becomes {@condition stupefied|CRB|stupefied 2} for 1 minute ({@condition stupefied|CRB|stupefied 4} on a critical failure). A creature slain by Soulfire Breath can't be resurrected except by powerful magic such as a {@spell wish} spell. The vavakia can't use.
bot.name: Soulfire Breath

entries: Breath again for {@dice 1d4} rounds.
bot.name: Soulfire

bot.requirements: The vavakia's last action was Soulfire Breath
entries: The vavakia inhales and regains 10 Hit Points for each creature damaged by its Soulfire Breath. Any excess healing is gained as temporary.
bot.name: Soulfire Inhalation

entries: Points, which remain for 1 minute.
bot.name: Hit

entries: If the vavakia critically hits with its tail {@action Strike}, the target must succeed at a DC 40 Fortitude save or be {@condition stunned} for 1 round ({@dice 1d4} rounds on a critical failure).
bot.name: Stunning Tail

entries: Large or smaller, claw, DC 40.
bot.name: Trample

entries: A viskithrel can detect a creature's scent up to a week after the creature has passed through or left an area, and it gains a +4 circumstance bonus to {@action Track} a creature whose scent it has detected.
top.name: Ravenous Tracker

entries: A viskithrel's many-chambered snout allows it to partition and ignore scents. The creature can choose to critically succeed at any saving throw against an inhaled threat (such as inhaled poison) or olfactory effects, regardless of its roll.
mid.name: Selective Scent

mid.trigger: A creature within 10 feet of the viskithrel makes a melee {@action Strike} against it
entries: The viskithrel {@action Step||Steps} up to 15 feet, ignoring difficult terrain as it leaps over obstacles. If this movement takes the viskithrel out of range of the triggering {@action Strike},
mid.name: Predator's Leap

entries: {@action Strike} is disrupted. It then makes a jaws {@action Strike} against a bleeding creature.
mid.name: the

entries: Melee talon +30 (agile, reach 10 feet), Damage {@damage 3d10+14} slashing Melee {@as 1} tentacle +30 (reach 20 feet), Damage {@damage 1d10+14} slashing plus {@damage 2d10} {@condition persistent damage ||persistent bleed}.
bot.name: and Grab

entries: Large, {@damage 3d10} bludgeoning plus {@damage 2d10} acid, Rupture 25.
bot.name: Swallow Whole

entries: The thoughtmaw senses a creature's mental essence at the listed range.
top.name: Thoughtsense

entries: 30 feet. A creature that enters the emanation must attempt a DC 36 Will save. On a failure, the creature is {@condition stupefied|CRB|stupefied 1} for 1 minute ({@condition stupefied|CRB|stupefied 2} and also {@condition paralyzed} for 1 round on a critical failure). A creature that succeeds at its save is temporarily immune to psychogenic secretions for 1 minute.
mid.name: Psychogenic Secretions

entries: telekinetic projectile; Constant (8th) fly Occult Rituals DC 36; inveigle.
bot.name: Cantrips

entries: The thoughtmaw invades the mind of a creature within 100 feet and attempts to swallow its capacity for higher thought. The creature must attempt a DC 36 Will save.
bot.name: Consume Knowledge

entries: Knowledge immediately ends any of the ability's previous effects on a different creature.

entries.Success: The creature is {@condition slowed|CRB|slowed 1} for 1 round.
entries.Failure: The creature is {@condition slowed|CRB|slowed 1} and can take no actions other than basic actions for 1 minute.
entries.Critical Failure: As failure, and the thoughtmaw is {@condition quickened|CRB|quickened 1} for 1 minute. It can use this extra action

bot.name: Using Consume

entries: {@action Cast a Spell} if the target had prepared spells or a spell repertoire.
